definition: spoonbill (wading bird of the family Threskiornithidae)
see 琵琶, pipa lute
heron
(bird species of China) Eurasian spoonbill (Platalea leucorodia)
(bird species of China) black-faced spoonbill (Platalea minor)

sentences.english: We should preserve the species such as black-faced spoonbills from extinction.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该保护像黑面琵鹭这种鸟类免于绝迹。

sentences.english: Black-faced spoonbills are an endangered species.
sentences.chinese: 黑面琵鹭是濒临绝种的品种。

sentences.english: Black-faced spoonbills are not voracious feeders , and so are even more needful of protection.
sentences.chinese: 黑面琵鹭的觅食能力不很强，因此需要更多的保护。

sentences.english: The facial skin is bare and black in colour - hence its name.
sentences.chinese: 脸呈黑色，皮肤裸露，所以名为黑脸琵鹭。

sentences.english: As I talked above , the limit of BFS is its memory.
sentences.chinese: 正如我上面谈到的黑脸琵鹭限制是它的内存。

sentences.english: Last spring, Shadle headed to Tampa Bay to photograph a spoonbill rookery there.
sentences.chinese: 去年夏天，夏德去坦帕湾拍摄琵鹭聚居地。
